C

C - Variable in class Controller.GestureController.P
Determines if this action is concurrent with the action directly after it
changeTolerance(int) - Method in class Controller.GestureController
Modifies Epsilon by e, a positive e will make position detection less sensitive and a negative e will make detection more sensitive.
chkCoord(int, float, int) - Method in class Controller.GestureController
Checks if val is between cur and prev, the bounds do not need to be in any order thus if prev > cur, cur > prev, or cur = prev this will still return the proper value

clear() - Method in class Controller.JointRecorder
Clears the recorder, deleting the current recording, isEmpty() will return true after this is called until record() is called.

Compares to floating point values taking Epsilon into account for equality.
compareJointPositions(PVector, PVector) - Static method in class Controller.GestureController
Calculates the angle between two points along three planes.
compressRecording() - Method in class Controller.GestureRecord
Removes all duplicate recorded joint comparisons that appear in sequence keeping only the head of the sequence in R.

A list of constant positions that must be true for the gesture to complete
